item.title: Yell 639
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:33, topic:423840”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=526494.msg3838514#msg3838514 date=1323048725]

  1. Here is pretty much a spoon feed.
    Anways So if your looking through, you will see something like <shad=660203> Change the “660203” to random numbers and the color will change
    Hope this helps

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
/*
*This is the sensor for the yell command
*/
String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
String[] bad = {"<img=1>", “<img=2>”, “<img=0>”, “Fuck”, “Nigger”, “Cunt”, “Faggot”};
for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){
return;
}
}
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

				if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15369497>[Extreme Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights == 4 )) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 1) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=3781373>[Moderator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 2) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=16112652>[Administrator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Co-Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Developer]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.isDonator == 0) {
					c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
				} else {
					if (c.isInJail()) {
						c.sendMessage("You cannot yell while you are in Jail!");
						return;
					}
					
				}
			}
		}
	}

}[/code]

Fricking retard, that’s for PI not dementhium.

I also said it was for PI in a later post. Read please.
Troll-back
[/quote]
WAsn’t aimed at you; it was aimed at deven.[/quote]
quoted me

Read full topic

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
/*
*This is the sensor for the yell command
*/
String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
String[] bad = {"<img=1>", “<img=2>”, “<img=0>”, “Fuck”, “Nigger”, “Cunt”, “Faggot”};
for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){
return;
}
}
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

				if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15369497>[Extreme Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights == 4 )) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 1) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=3781373>[Moderator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 2) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=16112652>[Administrator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Co-Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Developer]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.isDonator == 0) {
					c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
				} else {
					if (c.isInJail()) {
						c.sendMessage("You cannot yell while you are in Jail!");
						return;
					}
					
				}
			}
		}
	}

}[/code]

Fricking retard, that’s for PI not dementhium.
[/quote]
I also said it was for PI in a later post. Read please.

item.description:

[code] if (command[0].equals(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Player c2 = World.getWorld.getPlayers[j];

                                    if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=15369497>[Donator]"+ Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) +": ";
                                    } else if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Deven")) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]"+ Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) +": ";
                                    } else if (player.getRights() == 2) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=3781373>[Moderator]"+ Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) +": ";
                                    } else if (player.getRights() >= 1) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=16112652>[Administrator]"+ Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) +": ";
                                    } else if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Prox_PK")) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]"+ Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) +": ";
                                    } else if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Prox_PKz")) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Co-Owner]"+ Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) +": ";
                                    } else if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Prox_cxvzPK")) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Developer]"+ Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) +": ";
                                    } else if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Deven")) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]"+ Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) +": "                                                
                                            }
                                            
                                    }
                            }
                    }[/code]
